page.title: 17GOVERNMENT Parish council(2)
page.content: On the 30th April ,1985{Blackboys and {Framfield Parish Council}discussed some of the following: -trees, refer to district council for a preservation order -heavy lorries,signs needed to redirect them -Best Kept Village Competition -street lights,need for a timeswitch -seat needing painting -grass verges,parish to pay for cutting as county cannot -barrier outside school needs painting -drains blocked with mud -dumping of rubbish -changes in parish boundaries -increase in electricity charges -narrow lanes and lorries, passing places needed,refer to county council -Neighbourhood Crime Watch -hall,Â£400 for hot and cold water -speed limits through Blackboys.
